Record Class SparseMatrixData<T>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
org.flag4j.arrays.SparseMatrixData<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the data of the matrix.
Record Components:
shape - Shape of the matrix.
data - Non-zero data of the sparse matrix.
rowData - Non-zero row indices/pointers.
colData - Non-zero column indices.
public record SparseMatrixData<T>(Shape shape, List<T> data, List<Integer> rowData, List<Integer> colData) extends Record

Data class for storing information for a sparse (CSR or COO) matrix.

This record stores three lists: the non-zero data, the row indices/pointers, and the column indices.

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
